typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMP_ID as decimal(38,18),
		LOGIN_NAME as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMP_TYPE_ID as decimal(38,18),
		GROUP_ID as decimal(38,18),
		DEPT_ID as decimal(38,18),
		LOC_ID as decimal(38,18),
		SYND_ID as decimal(38,18),
		DISABLED_IND as decimal(38,18),
		LOGGING_IND as decimal(38,18),
		UNDERWRITER_IND as decimal(38,18),
		CLAIMS_ADJUSTER_IND as decimal(38,18),
		REMINDER_RESP_IND as string,
		PASSWORD_DATE as timestamp,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		CREATED_WHEN as timestamp,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_WHEN as timestamp,
		PERSONAL_CLAIMS_IND as decimal(38,18),
		NEW_LOGIN_NAME as string,
		E_MAIL as string,
		PROMAN_EKEY as decimal(38,18),
		JOBNAME as string,
		UNDERWRITER_ASSISTANT_IND as decimal(38,18),
		OLD_LOGIN_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_PAYMENT_LEVEL_ID as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(output(
		INCIDENT_ID as decimal(38,18),
		UNIQUE_ENTRY_ID as decimal(38,18),
		INCIDENT_FILE_NUMBER as decimal(38,18),
		CLAIM_TYPE_ID_MAIN_CLAIM_TYPE as decimal(38,18),
		EMPLOYEE_ID_MAIN_ADJUSTER as decimal(38,18),
		MEMBERS_REFERENCE as string,
		ARCHIVE_NUMBER as decimal(38,18),
		ARCHIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		OLD_ARCHIVE_NUMBER as decimal(38,18),
		OLD_ARCHIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		GEOGRAPHICAL_AREA_ID_PLACE as decimal(38,18),
		GEOGRAPHICAL_AREA_ID_VOY_FROM as decimal(38,18),
		GEOGRAPHICAL_AREA_ID_VOY_TO as decimal(38,18),
		DATE_OF_INCIDENT as timestamp,
		MONTH_OR_PERIOD_OF_INCIDENT as string,
		CASUALTY_ID as decimal(38,18),
		MAIN_CAUSE_ID as decimal(38,18),
		GEOGRAPHICAL_AREA_ID_MAIN_JUR as decimal(38,18),
		CURRENCY_ID_MAIN_CURRENCY as decimal(38,18),
		INCIDENT_TEXT as string,
		EMPLOYEE_ID_REGISTERED_BY as decimal(38,18),
		REGISTERED_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REVIEWED_DATE as timestamp,
		LARGE_CLAIMS_GROUP_INDICATOR as string,
		TOTAL_CURRENT_RESERVE_USD as double,
		TOTAL_CURRENT_COMP_USD as double,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		CREATED_WHEN as timestamp,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_WHEN as timestamp,
		TIMESTAMP_ as decimal(38,18),
		OFFICE_ROLE_ID_REFUND as decimal(38,18),
		REFUND_PERCENT as decimal(38,18),
		REFUND_MAPPER_NUMBER as decimal(38,18),
		PHYSICAL_FILE_CREATED as decimal(38,18),
		GEOGRAPHICAL_AREA_ID_1ST_PORT as decimal(38,18),
		TIMEBAR as timestamp,
		DEALT_WITH as string,
		OM_CLAIM_TYPE as decimal(38,18),
		COMPLEXITY_ID as double,
		NO_ICR_REMINDER_DATE as timestamp,
		EVENT_ID as double,
		EVENT_DETAIL_ID as double,
		MAIN_CLAIM_DETAIL_ID as double,
		MYGARD_CLAIM_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source(output(
		SYND_ID as decimal(38,18),
		SYND_NAME as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		CREATED_WHEN as timestamp,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_WHEN as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source3
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source4
source1 sink(input(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
